head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BLUMSTEIN, SARAH ENGLANDER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BLUMSTEIN, SARAH ENGLANDER

block.p: BLUMSTEIN-Sarah Englander, age 95, a resident of the Hebrew Home for the Aged, passed away on Sunday, June 4th, 2000. Beloved mother of Allan, mother-in-law of Susan, grandmother of Eve and Zachary, and sister of Florence Slipyan. Funeral to be held Tuesday, June 6th, 12:30 PM, at Plaza Memorial Chapel, 630 Amsterdam at 91st St. Contributions may be made to the Educational Alliance, 197 East Broadway, NY NY 10002.
